Factsheet

The Iluminatus Company
Based in Mexico
Release date:

Website:
Regular Price:
USD 5.99
MXN 69

Description

Jump and survive! Help Iluminatus escape a bizarre world full of mutant viruses, creepy llamas, aliens, and powerful bosses! Unlock abilities, climb puzzling levels, or test your skills in endless mode.

History

Idea

Climb massive pyramids, hopping from platform to platform to reach the summit. Every level is a new puzzle that will challenge your wits and skills.

Development

Climb massive pyramids, hopping from platform to platform to reach the summit. Every level is a new puzzle that will challenge your wits and skills.

Features

  • Simple control just jump and some powerups.
  • Retro look and feel.
  • A lot of colorfull skins.
  • Funny story related to my channel which can be enjoyed by fans of the channel or fans of the genre.

About The Iluminatus Company

Boilerplate
The Iluminatus Company is a small independent game development studio focused on creating challenging experiences for hardcore players. The studio combines demanding gameplay mechanics with a strong sense of humor. Despite its very small team, every project is developed with great care and attention to detail, emphasizing personality and passion in every aspect of the game.
